name: watchlist
description: Simple and modern web app to track your favorite movies and TV shows

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.db:setup: npm run db:check && cd backend && npm run db:generate && npm run db:migrate
scripts.test:build: npm run build && echo '✅ SUCCESS: Build test passed!'
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run db:setup && echo '✅ SUCCESS: Setup complete! Run npm run dev to start development servers'
scripts.clean: rm -rf frontend/dist frontend/node_modules backend/dist backend/node_modules node_modules && echo '✅ Cleaned all dependencies and build files'
scripts.lint: cd frontend && npm run lint && cd ../backend && echo 'Backend linting not configured'
scripts.type-check: cd frontend && npm run type-check && cd ../backend && npx tsc --noEmit
